full_text: RSs Pee oak es IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2018/KER/735 PRESENT : THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA MONDAY, THE 8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 18TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 8665 of 2017 C.C.NO. 1654/2015 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II, KOLLAM PETITIONER(S) /ACCUSED : ELVIN @ SIJO, S/O EVEREST, BRIJIT BHAVAN, KAIKULANGARA CHERRY, KOLLAM WEST VILLAGE, KOLLAM. BY ADV.SRI.C.RAJENDRAN RESPONDENT (S) /STATH/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT : 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. 2. IGNASIUS@JOY, S/O JOSEPH, ISTHAQUIR PARAMBU, KAIKULANGARA CHERRY, KOLLAM WEST VILLAGE, KOLLAM. Ri BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.ALEX M.THOMBRA R2 BY ADV. SRI.B.K.GOPALAKRISHNAN THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: Msd. RSs rae oak es Crl.MC.No. 8665 of 2017 2018/KER/735 APPENDIX PETITIONER(S)' ANNEXURES : ANNEXURE AL A TRUE PHOTOCOPY OF THE FIR IN CRIME NO.130/2014 OF THE PALLITHOTTAM POLICE STATION. ANNEXURE A2 A TRUE PHOTOCOPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN C.C.NO.1654/2015 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-II, KOLLAM. ANNEXURE A3 ORIGINAL COPY OF THE AFFIDAVIT OF THE 2ND RESPONDENT DATED 30.11.2017. RESPONDENT (S) ' ANNEXURES : NIL //'TRUE COPY// P.S.TO JUDGE Msd. 2018/KER/735 B.KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 8" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioner is the accused in C.C.No.1654 of 2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrates Court-Il, Kollam, which has arisen from Crime No.130 of 2014 of the Pallithottam Police Station, registered for the offences punishable under Sections 294(b), 341 and 323 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably seitled between the parties. 3. On going through the facts and circumstances of the case, it seems that the matter can be permitted to be settled. It has been reported that no criminal antecedents have been reported against the petitioner. The defacto complainant has filed Annexure-A3, affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between him and the petitioner and he has no complaints against the petitioner. Considering the fact that the matter has already been settled amicably between the parties, this court is satisfied that no 2018/KER/735 Crl.M.C.No.8665 of 2017 2 purpose would be served in proceeding with the trial of the case. Matters being so, Annexure-Al First Information Report, Annexure-A2 Final Report and all further proceedings in C.C.No.1654 of 2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrates Court-Il, Kollam, which has arisen from Crime No.130 of 2014 of the Pallithottam Police Station, as against the petitioner, are liable to be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and Annexure-Al First Information Report, Annexure-A2 Final Report and all further proceedings in C.C.No.1654 of 2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrates Court-ll, Kollam, which has arisen from Crime No.130 of 2014 of the Pallithottam Police Station, as against the petitioner, are hereby quashed. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA JUDGE DSV/8/1/18 // True Copy // P.A.To Judge
